channel.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] PM filtering
channel.description:
I know there is way to make labels/rules but as far as I know at least it doesn't send the actual user to a specific label/sort via that. What I am suggesting is something like this:
-Inbox has choice to be sorted via username "folders". This way you can keep messages from certain people more categorically. -Perhaps we could get more space for private messages? :/ I don't know about you guys but I get a fairly good many messages and some of them I just don't want to get rid of. -Add an option to "download an archive" of current messages in inbox this way if you need to delete you can. -Have it so you can have certain users emails be auto sent to a certain folder as I was talking earlier

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] PM filtering
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

There is already a built-in functionality that does this, or something similar to this. There’s no point in adding a modification for something that already exists to be honest.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] PM filtering
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:12, topic:518726”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=636988.msg4295230#msg4295230 date=1368105268]

Haha, thanks for showing me there. Guess you’ve got this figured out then, no problems?
[/quote]still got problems and I still think the amount should be reaised for at least a certain post rank

That may cause people to flame, spam and make useless posts in order to achieve that, not sure if that is a good idea.[/quote]Hmm I read something a while back about a new group that was coming out? How about for them or something? And the staff will/should take care of post abusers anyway so I don’t see the point lol.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] PM filtering
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I know there is way to make labels/rules but as far as I know at least it doesn’t send the actual user to a specific label/sort via that. What I am suggesting is something like this:

-Inbox has choice to be sorted via username “folders”. This way you can keep messages from certain people more categorically.
-Perhaps we could get more space for private messages? I don’t know about you guys but I get a fairly good many messages and some of them I just don’t want to get rid of.
-Add an option to “download an archive” of current messages in inbox this way if you need to delete you can.
-Have it so you can have certain users emails be auto sent to a certain folder as I was talking earlier
